com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util

クラス SmartWirelessHeadsetProUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.SmartWirelessHeadsetProUtil

  • public class SmartWirelessHeadsetProUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains Smart Wireless Headset pro specific utility functions and constants

    • メソッドの詳細

      • createTextPaint

        public static TextPaint createTextPaint(Context context)
        Create text paint for Smart Wireless Headset pro for current locale.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        戻り値:
        The text paint.

      • getConfirmBitmap

        public static Bitmap getConfirmBitmap(Context context,
                      java.lang.String text,
                      boolean okInFocus,
                      boolean hideCancel)
        Generate bitmap with ok and cancel icons and a text.
        パラメータ:
        context - The context.
        text - The text.
        okInFocus - true if ok icon should be focused else false.
        hideCancel - true if cancel icon should be hidden.
        戻り値:
        The text paint.
